Articles.Content: I posted recently about a new way I've been playing.. I start with electric generation, full steel structurals, and drilling capabilities but NO FUEL!.. I use KSP foundries, infernal robotics, KAS KIS, and EPL.. SO I start by finding a good place for a new base.. I build land rovers, paddle boats, etc,etc to get an EPL launchpad set up there. then I start drilling for fuel and rocketparts, etc.... I basically build my own base elsewhere.. The only time I have to ever switch to KSC is to unlock new parts, and (unfortunately) recruit new kerbals.. then fly them to the new base, etc,etc... I need a new UP-to-date mod that allows for kerbal breeding/population SO i can set up a breeding ground near my new base and have kerbals for the ships I build instead of using the KSC all the time... Does anyone know of any??!!!!

2 minutes ago, MeCripp said:

Have you tried Civilian Population ? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/111815-104civilian-population-1751-update-101215/

 Reading the latest entries on it's page, it seems to have some problems in 1.0.5 and needs an update.

Edited January 9, 2016 by Talavar
Seen that after posting it but just talks about LS problems that some one could work around if that was all it was ?
